description: Run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Sendrecv among processors in the selected node(s), on which Intel MPI should be installed as prerequisite.

description.2018: The Intel MPI 2018, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.0.128 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.0.128, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Sendrecv.
description.2018 Update 1: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 1, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.1.163 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.1.156, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Sendrecv.
description.2018 Update 2: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 2, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.2.199 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.2.185, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Sendrecv.
description.2018 Update 3: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 3, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.3.222 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.3.210, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Sendrecv.
description.2018 Update 4: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 4, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.4.274 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.4.274, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Sendrecv.

parameters.name: Max runtime
parameters.description: Specify the max time in seconds the test could run.
